name: Space Disaster
description:
HEADSUP: When fixing a malfunction dont repeatedly press Interact!

You are playing H. Bert , a single Astronaut on his deep space exploration. But something went horribly wrong. The ship starts all kinds of malfunctions from the airlock not staying shut to the toilet starting to flood the ship. Its your job to fix the problems as they occur before its to late!

Controls:

  • Walk: Left: A | Right: D
  • No Gravity/Swimming: Movement: Up: W | Down: S | Rotate Left: A | Rotate Right: D
  • Pick Up Item: Click on it ;D
  • Throw Item: Left Mouse
  • Drop Item: Q
  • Interact: E
